tool_description: Checks real-time availability, stock levels, and pricing information for multiple items simultaneously.

item_ids.description: Array of item identifiers to check

check_price_changes.description: Whether to include price change information

include_alternatives.description: Whether to suggest alternative items if unavailable

error_messages: Empty item list: At least one item ID must be provided.
Too many items: Maximum 50 items can be checked at once.
Invalid item ID format: All item IDs must be non-empty strings.
Some items not found: One or more item IDs do not exist in the catalog.
usage: Provide an array of item_ids to check their availability. Optionally enable price change tracking and alternative suggestions for out-of-stock items.

availability_results.description: Array of availability status for each item (available, out_of_stock, limited_stock)

stock_levels.description: Array of current stock quantities for each item

current_prices.description: Array of current prices for each item

price_changes.description: Array of price change indicators (increased, decreased, unchanged)

check_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the availability check was performed
